labels.rebuildDbWarning: Database structure changed. Rebuild is required to ensure proper functionality.

messages.thousandSeparatorEqualsDecimalMark: The thousands separator character can not be the same as the decimal point character.
messages.selectEntityType: Select the entity type in the left menu.
messages.selectLayout: Select the layout in the left menu and edit it.
messages.incorrectThousandSeparatorOrDecimalMark: Only the following delimiters are allowed: '.' and ','.
messages.rebuildDb: The changes that will be applied to your database when you click the 'Apply' button are listed below. Some data may be incompatible with the new software version and could be lost. This action is irreversible.

descriptions.matchings: Matchings helps identify similar records across entities using user-defined rules.
descriptions.incomingWebhook: Incoming Webhooks let you trigger predefined Actions via external HTTP requests, with optional security like hash verification and IP whitelisting.
descriptions.Storage: Manage physical locations for all uploaded files (Local File System, Microsoft Sharepoint, Amazon S3, etc.)
descriptions.listOfSupportedFilesTypes: Manage file types for additional file validation (e.g. images, documents, videos, etc.) and classification.
descriptions.thumbnailTypes: Manage thumbnail types to change the width or height of a thumbnail, or to create a new one.
descriptions.folders: Maintain virtual folders for saving uploaded files.
descriptions.locale: Manage locale settings such as language, date and time format, decimal separator, thousand separator, as well as locale-specific measure units.
descriptions.composer: Update the system and all installed modules, install or remove publicly or privately available modules. Module version dependency is automatically considered.
descriptions.measure: Manage your measures and measure units, set default measure units and multipliers for automatic measure unit conversion.
descriptions.connection: Manage connections with other systems for an automatic data exchange.
descriptions.settings: Manage general system settings such as default system locale, search preferences, active interface languages, cache usage and more...
descriptions.jobs: Manage system jobs that run in the background without direct user interaction.
descriptions.action: Configure actions that can be executed manually, by clicking buttons added to the user interface, or fully automatically via a Schedule Manager job.
descriptions.clearCache: Clear metadata cache and other system cache, use this option if you have errors while working with the system.
descriptions.rebuildDb: Align the database structure in accordance with the configured metadata.
descriptions.users: Manage system users, their preferences, roles and teams as well as validate their access level and permissions for all entities.
descriptions.teams: Manage teams and user assignment to teams.
descriptions.roles: Manage roles â€“ set permissions to create, read, write and delete records, define access levels (own, team-related or all records) for all entities in the system, define specific permissions for single fields.
descriptions.outboundEmails: Set SMTP server settings for outgoing emails.
descriptions.layoutManager: Manage standard system layouts for (side) list view, (side) detail view, relation panels and their sorting order, mass update, etc.
descriptions.entityManager: Configure your data model by managing existing entities and creating new ones. Manage and create fields and relationships between entities.
descriptions.userInterface: Select your CSS style, configure main navigation items, default dashboards and entities, available for quick create as well as manage other settings for user interfaces.
descriptions.authTokens: Investigate active authorization sessions, including users' IP address and last access date and time.
descriptions.notifications: Manage settings for in-app and email notifications.
descriptions.actionHistory: See the history of all user actions in the system, including username, target data record, action type, IP address, access date and time.
descriptions.labelManager: Manage label translations for pre-selected languages, push your translations for the review by AtroCore team as well as reset your translations to default values.
descriptions.accounts: Represents business entities such as customers, suppliers, or partners, used to manage relationships and transactions within the system.
descriptions.contacts: Store individual people associated with Accounts, including their roles and communication details for interaction and coordination.
descriptions.addresses: Are structured location details for Accounts, enabling accurate identification, billing, and shipping operations.
descriptions.currency: Define the supported currencies used across the system for pricing, transactions, and other financial operations.
descriptions.lists: Manage your lists and their options for simple or multivalue lists.
descriptions.emailTemplates: Manage email templates for manual or automated email delivery (not for standard notifications).
descriptions.notificationTemplates: Manage  template for standard notification of the system.
descriptions.notificationProfiles: Configure Notification Profiles and Notification Rules to effectively streamline your alert management process so that it is timely and relevant.
descriptions.layoutProfiles: Manage and customize different layout configurations for the system's user interface
descriptions.apiRequest: Use this feature to quickly create complex data structures such as configured import or export feeds.
descriptions.style: Create, update and customize new styles to make adjustments to standard CSS
